definition: to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade

sentences.english: Quzong Bridge and two-colored river water below.
sentences.chinese: 飞渡天堑的曲宗大桥和桥下汇流的两色江水。

sentences.english: For river network routing, the Muskingum method is usually used.
sentences.chinese: 汇流演算基于河网结构采用分段马斯京根方法。

sentences.english: Design and development of the experimental system of runoff-producing and flow concentration of city underlying surface.
sentences.chinese: 设计并研制了城市下垫面降雨产汇流实验系统。

sentences.english: It is located on Dublin Bay at the mouth of the Liffey River at its confluence with the Dodder River.
sentences.chinese: 她坐落于利菲河河口与多德河的汇流处的都柏林湾。

sentences.english: The bus bar is one of the important components in phased array radar antenna.
sentences.chinese: 汇流条是相控阵雷达天线中的重要组件。

sentences.english: Busbars between the cubicles and the generator terminals shall be included.
sentences.chinese: 还应包括柜与发电机终端间的汇流条。

sentences.english: We approached the confluence at the perfect speed.
sentences.chinese: 我们以恰到好处的速度来到汇流处。

sentences.english: The method presented can be used to derive unit hydrographs for ungaged watersheds.
sentences.chinese: 提出的方法可用于分析无资料流域的汇流单位线。

sentences.english: Dispelling confluent vortex is the principal object in technical development of preventing slag down.
sentences.chinese: 消除汇流旋涡是防下渣技术开发的首要目标。

sentences.english: The confluence of two mountain streams of the northwestern shore of the Neogene of silt on the rock.
sentences.chinese: 两条山溪汇流处的西北岸的新第三纪的粉砂岩壁上。

sentences.english: Buses – Most routers contain a system bus and a CPU bus.
sentences.chinese: 大部分路由器含有系统汇流排和CPU汇流排。

sentences.english: Buses – Most routers contain a system bus and a CPU bus.
sentences.chinese: 大部分路由器含有系统汇流排和CPU汇流排。

sentences.english: Thirdly, with nonlinear Muskingim model integrated, confluence parameter can be correctioned.
sentences.chinese: 与马法非线性解法的有机结合，实现汇流参数的校正。

sentences.english: The cable plugged into a central connection device that contained the shared bus.
sentences.chinese: 此缆线插入一含共享汇流排的中央连接设备。

definition: to flow into/to converge (of river)/(computing) to import (data)
to flow at great speed/to pour/racing current
to converge/to flow together/fig. to act alike/to evolve together
variant of 交匯|交汇/to flow together/confluence (of rivers, airflow, roads)/(international) cooperation
to flow together/confluence (of rivers, airflow, roads)/(international) cooperation
to well up/to spill out (of water from a spring)
all things tend in one direction (idiom)
